bibl.title: Two Unknown Ptolemaic Portraits in the Archaeological Museum in Cracow (Poland).
Patrizia MINÃ€ (coordinamento e redazione), Faraoni come dei, Tolemei come faraoni. Atti del V Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano, Torino, Archivio di Stato, 8-12 dicembre 2001
bibl.author: SZYMANSKA, Hanna

bibl.note: Two objects in the Archaeological Museum in Cracow from the so-called "Field Museum", which was founded by Polish soldiers fighting during World War II in the ranks of the British Forces: alabaster torso of young man (h. 15 cm), depicting probably Ptolemy V Epiphanes; terracotta head (h. 7 cm), presumably a portrait of the same ruler.
